item.title: Teams - DeepLink in Adaptive Cards
item.description: Introduction In this post we’ll be looking at how to create interactive card that allows you to create an adaptive card with deeplink buttons. One of the use case for this is that for eg: a chatbot sends you a notification with phone number and you would like to press on the button to make a call directly to that person. Same thing for a chat as well. Especially for Teams Mobile user.
